about.title: All-in-One Nintendo Switch Updater
about.disclaimers:
◆ Aside from cheat codes that are mirrored from the main GBAtemp thread, HamletDuFromage isn't hosting anything. All credits go to respective owners.
◆ Links are refreshed every 30 minutes. If a link remains broken after 30 minutes have passed, please open a Github issue.
about.donate: ◆ Like the app? Consider donating to support my efforts: 'https://git.io/donate_homlet'

cheats.label: The following titles have received cheat code updates the last time you used the app. Please note that despite having been downloaded for a game, cheats may not match its current update.
cheats.exclude: Exclude games from receiving cheat updates
cheats.cheats_label: ◆ Download individual cheat codes from the GBAtemp.net database or cheat sheets from Cheat Slips
cheats.cheatslips_dl:
Download a selection of cheat sheets from Cheat Slips.
Those cheat codes will be added to the end of your existing cheat file.
cheats.cheatslips_error: Could not fetch selected cheat codes/invalid token.
cheats.quota:
Quota exceeded for today!
Head on to 'https://www.cheatslips.com/subscriptions' to see how to increase it.
cheats.cheatslips_select: Select a game to download cheats for.
cheats.cheatslips_wrong_id: Couldn't retrieve token, make sure you enter your login properly
cheats.kb_error: If they keyboard did not show up, try running the app with full RAM access (title override)
cheats.bid_not_found: Couldn't obtain build ID. Try launching AIO-Switch-Updater in applet mode while the game is running.
cheats.exclude_titles_desc: You can turn off cheat updates with this menu
cheats.dl_all: Download and extract the entire GBAtemp.net cheats archive
cheats.gbatemp_dl: Download cheat codes curated from GBAtemp.net. Those cheats will be added to the end of your existing cheat file.
cheats.gbatemp_dl_successful_dl:
Successfully downloaded the following cheat code:
{}
cheats.applet_mode_not_supported: Due to memory constraints, in applet mode you may only fetch cheat codes for the game you're currently playing. Please launch AIO-Switch-Updater through title override to download cheat codes for any game you own.
cheats.cheatfile_label: Here are the cheat codes listed in file {}
cheats.not_found: No proper cheat codes could be found for this game
cheats.deletion_error:
Couldn't delete the cheat files for game with ID:
{}
cheats.cheats_not_found: Couldn't find cheat codes matching this build ID.

common.applet_mode_not_supported: This feature isn't available in applet mode. Please launch AIO-Switch-Updater through title override to access it.

payloads.select: Select a payload to reboot to.

joy_con.title: Joy-Con color swapper
joy_con.description:
You can change the internal color of your Joy-Cons. Make sure they're docked.
Color profiles are stored in `{}`. Go to '{}' to generate your own custom profiles.
joy_con.label: Joy-Con color swapper
joy_con.backing_up: Backing up the current color profile. Make sure the Joy-Cons are docked. If the process hangs, try docking/undocking the Joy-Cons.
joy_con.changing: Changing color. Make sure the Joy-Con are docked. If the process hangs, try docking/undocking the Joy-Cons.
joy_con.all_done: All done! You may need to dock/undock your Joy-Cons for the change to take effect.

pro_con.title: Pro controller color swapper
pro_con.desc: You can change the internal color of your Pro controller. Make sure it's set to player 1.
pro_con.warning: AIO-Switch-Updater does not currently support changing Pro controller grip color. Use Joy-Con Toolkit on PC instead.
pro_con.label: Pro controller color swapper
pro_con.all_done: All done! You may need to turn your controller on and off for the change to take effect.
pro_con.changing: Changing color. Make sure the Pro controller is set to player 1.

main.firmware_text:
◆ Firmware dumps from 'https://darthsternie.net/switch-firmwares/'. Once downloaded, it will be extracted in '/firmware'. You can then install the update through Daybreak.
◆ Current FW:
main.cheats_text:
◆ This will download a daily updated archive of cheat codes from 'gbatemp.net'. Cheat codes for games you don't have installed won't be extracted to your SD card. You can turn off cheat updates for specific games in 'Tools→Cheat menu'.
◆ Current cheats version:
main.ams_text: ◆ From this menu, you can download and update the Atmosphère custom firmware necessary to run homebrew software.
main.links_not_found:
Could not find a download link, make sure the Switch has access to the internet.
If this problem persists, please open an issue on Github.
main.launch_warning:
Please pay attention to the following points before using the app:

◆ Read up on how to manually update your Switch first. This will help you understand the app better and you'll know what to do in case something goes wrong.
◆ In order to avoid any risk of data corruption, using this app on an exFAT SD card is STRONGLY discouraged.

◆ The latest information about features that have been introduced and/or changed is available in the  Tools→Changelog menu.

This screen won't show again.
main.theme_warning:
It seems like you have a custom theme installed, this may cause your system to fail to boot after upgrading your firmware.
Please consider deleting it before upgrading.
main.hekate_ipl_label: ◆ Download a stripped down "just works" hekate_ipl.ini config file. This will overwrite your current hekate_ipl.ini.

hide.title: Hide tabs
hide.desc: Hide tabs from the main menu

tools.batch_copy_not_found: The following files were not found and couldn't be copied:
tools.batch_copy_config_not_found: This tool allows you to automatically copy files to specific locations. This might be useful depending on your bootloader/trinket. Grab copy_files.txt at 'https://git.io/aiosu_copyfiles', edit it and add it to your config folder. This will also be performed after updates.
tools.outdated_titles_desc: The following titles have available updates:

utils.fw_warning: Because of the size of FW archives, downloading firmwares in Applet Mode is not supported. Please launch the app with full RAM access.
utils.overwrite: Do you want to overwrite existing
utils.not_an_archive: The downloaded file is not a zip archive. This is most likely due to a broken link. If the problem persists after more than 30 minutes, please open an issue on Github.
utils.overwrite_inis: Do you want to overwrite existing .ini config files?
utils.set_hekate_reboot_payload: Do you want to copy the Hekate payload `{}` to `{}`?

ams_update.reboot_rcm: The Switch will now reboot to a special payload in order to finalise the install.
ams_update.install_hekate:
Do you want to also download hekate?
If not, the Switch will now reboot to a special payload in order to finalise the install.
ams_update.delete_contents: Would you like to remove the existing '/atmosphere/contents/' directory? This will prevent crashes if you have sysmodules that do not support the latest Atmosphère. Please note that it will delete all your existing sysmodules, mods and cheats.
ams_update.delete_sysmodules_flags: Would you like to delete all the custom sysmodules startup flags? This will turn off all your sysmodules and prevent crashes if you have sysmodules that do not support the latest Atmosphère.
ams_update.depends_on: The following modules will also be installed:
ams_update.deepsea_label: ◆ DeepSea by Team Neptune is a CFW pack that includes Atmosphère, hekate, and various homebrew apps.
ams_update.cant_fetch_deepsea: Couldn't fetch packages. Open a Github issue if this persists.
ams_update.build_your_deepsea: Build your own custom DeepSea package by selecting packages
ams_update.custom_packs_label: ◆ Here are packs listed in the {} file. Be aware that those are not endorsed by AIO-Switch-Updater so make sure you trust their source.
ams_update.custom_packs_ams: ◆ Downloads containing the Atmosphère custom firmware.

firmware.launch_daybreak: Do you want to launch Daybreak to install the downloaded sysupdate?

errors.insufficient_storage: There isn't enough space available on your SD card to perform this operation.
errors.error_message:
{}
Please try again in a little while. If the problem persists, open an issue on GitHub.
errors.mariko_payload_missing: In order to update Atmosphère on patched Switches, your payload needs to be named "payload.bin" and should be at the root of your SD card.
